page.title: 08A Day In My Life Continued
page.content: for bed.Dad reads a bedtime story while Tracy stays with me for a talk,we don't have much time together but we have with no outside pressures.By nine o'clock everybody is usually in bed and settled and what a wonderful moment,every mothers dreams,all my children fit,healthy and fast asleep.My husband and I have a small time to ourselves then we start preparing for morning.Clothes out ready for Sunday morning,joint out of the freezer,tidy up again then into the most wonderful place on earth--- BED.
